xwikidoc.name: DocumentTreeTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Document Tree Translations
xwikidoc.content:
rendering.macro.documentTree.name=Arbre de Documents rendering.macro.documentTree.description=Mostra l'arbre de documents Xwiki. rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.readOnly.name=Només Lectura rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.readOnly.description=L'usuari pot modificar l'estructura d'arbre, sempre que disposi dels drets necessaris? rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showWikis.name=Mostra Wikis rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showWikis.description=Si s'ha de mostrar els nodes wiki o no. Això només es pot utilitzar al wiki principal i si la font de l'arbre s'ha desat amb drets de programació. rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showWikiPrettyName.name=Mostra el nom bonic del Wiki rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showWikiPrettyName.description=Mostra el nom bonic del wiki en lloc de l'identificador wiki quan es mostra un node wiki. rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showSpaces.name=Mostra els Espais rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showSpaces.description=Si s'ha de mostrar els nodes de l'espai o no. Els documents s'agrupen per espai si es mostren els nodes de l'espai. rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showDocumentTitle.name=Mostre el títol del document rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showDocumentTitle.description=Indica si es mostrarà el títol del document en comptes del nom del document quan es mostri un node de document. rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showTranslations.name=Mostra Traduccions rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showTranslations.description=Si s'ha de mostrar les traduccions del document o no. rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showAttachments.name=Mostra arxius adjunts rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showAttachments.description=Si mostrar els arxius adjunts del document o no. rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showObjects.name=Mostra Objectes rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showObjects.description=Si mostrar arxius adjunts del document o no. rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showClassProperties.name=Mostra les propietats de la Classe rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showClassProperties.description=Si mostrar les propietats de la classe als documents que defineixen classes. rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.root.name=Arrel ### Missing: rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.root.description= rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showRoot.name=Mostra l'arrel ### Missing: rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showRoot.description=Whether to show the root node or not. The root node is not shown by default because it is usually implied from the context where the tree is displayed (e.g. a label before the tree). There are some cases though when you may want to display the root node: to be able to create a new node under the root. rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.compact.name=Compacte ### Missing: rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.compact.description=If you have limited horizontal space available then you should probably set this to true. The effect is that the node icons and the edges that connect them will be hidden. Some special styles will also be applied to ensure the tree takes less horizontal space while keeping the node labels fully visible. rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.links.name=Enllaços ### Missing: rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.links.description=Specifies whether the node labels should look and behave as links (anchors). ### Missing: rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.checkboxes.name=Checkboxes ### Missing: rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.checkboxes.description=Whether to display a checkbox in front of each tree node to allow the user to select multiple tree nodes. ### Missing: rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.openTo.name=Open to ### Missing: rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.openTo.description= rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showOnlyViewable.name=Mostra només el que és visible ### Missing: rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showOnlyViewable.description=Show only the wiki, space and page nodes for which the current user has view right. If this is set to false then the wiki, space and page nodes that are not viewable by the current user are listed in the tree using their names. The user won't be able to see their content by following their links though (the user will just be aware of their existence). rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.filterByClass.name=Filtra per Classe ### Missing: rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.filterByClass.description=Show only the pages that have an object of the specified type. The value of this parameter is the full name of an XWiki page that holds a class definition. For example, 'Blog.CategoryClass' can be used to show only the pages that represent blog categories. Leave this parameter empty if you don't want to restrict the type of pages shown in the tree. rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.finder.name=Cercador ### Missing: rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.finder.description=Show a text input that can be used to find tree nodes. The input is displayed above the tree and offers suggestions as you type based on the content of the tree. When a suggestion is selected the tree is expanded up to the corresponding node. rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.hierarchyMode.name=Mode de jerarquia de la pàgina ### Missing: rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.hierarchyMode.description=Specifies which hierarchy to use between pages. Possible values are "reference" (default) and "parentchild". If "reference" is used then the page hierarchy is defined using only the page reference, especially the nested spaces component of the page reference. If "parentchild" is used then the hierarchy is based on the parent/child relationship defined by the "parent" page field from the database. rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.filterHiddenDocuments.name=Filtra documents ocults ### Missing: rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.filterHiddenDocuments.description=Set this parameter to false if you want to include the hidden documents in the tree. Otherwise, if the value is true, the hidden documents are excluded or included based on current user's preferences. rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.limit.name=Límit ### Missing: rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.limit.description=The maximum number of child nodes to display when expanding a parent node for the first time. The rest of the child nodes are accessible through a "more ..." link. This parameter is basically used to paginate the child nodes and thus helps the tree scale when the number of child nodes is large. rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.exclusions.name=Exclusions ### Missing: rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.exclusions.description=The list of nodes to exclude from the tree. The nodes are specified by their id and separated by comma. rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.sortDocumentsBy.name=Ordena les pàgines per rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.sortDocumentsBy.description=El camp de pàgina utilitzat per ordenar les pàgines filles, seguit de l'ordre d'ordenació. rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.expandToLevel.name=Expandeix al nivell rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.expandToLevel.description=Defineix la profunditat de l'arbre a expandir automàticament. Per defecte és 0 i significa que només es mostren els nodes de nivell superior. Un nivell d'1 els obre, un nivell de 2 també obre els nens per sota dels nodes recentment mostrats, etc. Tingueu en compte que un valor alt pot fer que la macro expansiva es mostri per al navegador. rendering.macro.children.name=Filles rendering.macro.children.description=Mostra un arbre de pàgines filles de la pàgina actual rendering.macro.children.parameter.sort.name=Ordena per rendering.macro.children.parameter.sort.description=El camp de pàgina utilitzat per ordenar les pàgines filles, seguit de l'ordre d'ordenació. rendering.macro.children.parameter.root.name=Arrel rendering.macro.children.parameter.root.description=L'identificador del node arrel. Això és útil si voleu mostrar només els descendents d'un determinat node (que és l'arrel especificada). L'arbre mostra els fills del node arrel en el primer nivell, de manera que el node arrel no es mostra realment. Es mostra tot l'arbre si no s'especifica el node arrel. ### Missing: rendering.macro.documentTree.group.show.name=Elements to show ### Missing: rendering.macro.documentTree.group.filters.name=Filters ### Missing: rendering.macro.documentTree.group.style.name=Display options index.documentTree.empty=No s'han trobat pàgines index.documentTree.more={0} més ... index.documentTree.addDocument=Nova pàgina... index.documentTree.documentSortDisplayer.field=Camp d'ordenació index.documentTree.documentSortDisplayer.field.default=--- index.documentTree.documentSortDisplayer.field.title=Títol index.documentTree.documentSortDisplayer.field.date=Data de la darrera modificació index.documentTree.documentSortDisplayer.field.creationDate=Data de creació index.documentTree.documentSortDisplayer.order=Ordre d'ordenació index.documentTree.documentSortDisplayer.order.default=--- index.documentTree.documentSortDisplayer.order.asc=Ascendent index.documentTree.documentSortDisplayer.order.desc=Descendent
## Deprecated translation keys
## Until 7.2M2 rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showChildDocuments.name=Mostra els documents fills ### Missing: rendering.macro.documentTree.parameter.showChildDocuments.description=Whether to show the child documents based on the document parent field.
